snippet: Plenette Pierson scored 17 points to lead the Liberty’s balanced offense as the team cruised to an 87-59 victory over the Phoenix Mercury in Newark.
abstract: New York Liberty defeat Phoenix Mercury, 87-59, in WNBA action.
lead_paragraph: Plenette Pierson scored 17 points to lead the Liberty’s balanced offense as the team cruised to an 87-59 victory over the Phoenix Mercury in Newark.

headline.seo: Liberty Beat Mercury and Move Into Playoff Spot
headline.main: Liberty Beat Mercury and Move Into Playoff Spot
headline.print_headline: Liberty Beat Mercury and Move Into Playoff Spot
